trans-unit.source: Supports the page parser in building a template and the child controls it contains.

To use a custom TemplateBuilder class for a control, create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> for the control, and then return the custom TemplateBuilder control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder"></xref> class.
Used during design time to build the template and its child controls.
A reference to the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder"></xref> class.
Called by the parser to inform the builder that the parsing of the control's opening and closing tags is complete.
Initializes the template builder when a Web request is made.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateParser"></xref> responsible for parsing the control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> responsible for building the control.
The <xref:System.Type> assigned to the control that the builder will create.
The name of the tag to build.
This allows the builder to support multiple tag types.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ID*> assigned to the control.
The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that holds all the specified tag attributes.
Defines the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object that child controls and templates belong to in design time.
The InstantiateIn method is required when implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface.
The InstantiateIn method is used only in design time.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to contain the instances of controls from the inline template.
Determines if the control builder needs to get its inner text.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A> method needs to be called when we are in design time.
The NeedsTagInnerText method returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.InDesigner%2A> property of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control builder needs to get its inner text.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Saves the inner text of the template tag.

The SetTagInnerText method overrides the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder.Text%2A> property.
The inner text of the template.
Gets or sets the text between the opening and closing tags of the template.
The Text property is used by the designer to specify or determine the text that appears between the opening and closing tags of the template.
The text that appears between the opening and closing tags of the template.
